title: Short-Term Course for Developing Information Literacy Skills for Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental information literacy skills and basic science domain concept understanding
context.additional_context: A program intensively developing scientific information literacy in a smartphone-based LMS environment, conducted with a focus on formative assessment and applying technology-integrated instructional design based on the TPACK model.

learning_goals: Learners can assess credible scientific information sources using at least three evaluation criteria
Learners can systematically search for scientific information in academic databases and public open repositories
Learners can evaluate scientific information credibility with over 80% accuracy by applying an evidence-based analysis framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
